item.title: "When the sky breathes fire": The Indian organization FACAM and the fight against militarization and corporativism. (DIE ROTE FAHNE)
item.description: Drone attacks and surface bombing are no longer uncommon in many regions of India. On January 13 of this year, the third drone -based bombing against the Indian population was carried out over the course of just five days, most of which are concentrated in central Indian areas that are primarily inhabited by indigenous people (so -called adivasi). At the beginning of this year, another 3,000 military forces were moved to these areas, in addition to the 10,000

item.title: LJR: assessment of the year 2023 - New era (Nouvelle Epoque)
item.description: The New Epoque editorial committee has decided to share, at their request, the balance sheet of the year 2023 of the Revolutionary Youth League (LJR). This assessment returns to the year of fire that was 2023 and on the great battles of the class struggle in which the LJR participated.
